menu.serve:help: Builds and serves your app, rebuilding on file changes.

serve.development:help: Builds and serves your app for a development environment.
serve.production:help: Builds and serves your app for a production environment.

menu.build:help: Compiles your app into an output directory.

build.development:help: Builds your app for a development environment.
build.production:help: Builds your app for a production environment.
